name: Morning Glory
description:
Auction #1 - 002
Artist: Cobalus (Andreas Valkenborgh) - www.cobalus.xyz
Series: Color & Shape
Year: 2019
Size: 80cm x 100cm (31,5in x 39,4in)

Cobalus' Color & Shape collection is a series of paintings inspired by images of a variety of wordly events and then dissected and translated into raw shapes and often vibrant colors. His work has evolved through a variety of creative and experimental side roads and intersections, and has always shifted between two poles, namely non-figurative/abstract and figurative, carefully avoiding a mere exact representation of reality.
